## Resources.ICandidateValueCreateParams.normalizer property

Optional normalizer to use for normalizing the JSON value. If not provided, a default Crc32Normalizer will be used.

**Signature:**

```typescript
normalizer?: Hash.Crc32Normalizer;
```
